entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 15 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 10 except 15 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
